text: The Ragamuffin War (Portuguese: Guerra dos Farrapos or Revolução Farroupilha) was an uprising that began in southern Brazil. It started in the province (current state) of Rio Grande do Sul in 1835. ==References== ==Other websites== * A review of Farroupilha Week in modern RS state * The Farroupilha War Category:19th century in South America Category:19th-century rebellions Category:civil wars Category:1835 Category:1845 Category:History of Brazil
title: Ragamuffin War
